page.title: 09LOCAL CHAPELS
page.content: IN THE PAST FEW YEARS THERE HAVE BEEN {CLOSURES OF METHODIST CHAPELS}IN THE AREA, TO THE EXTENT THAT THERE ARE NOW ONLY{TWO METHODIST PLACES OF WORSHIP THAT ARE{OPEN}TODAY.{DOWNGATE CHAPEL WAS RECENTLY UNDER THE THREAT OF CLOSURE BUT DUE TO THE EFFORTS OF THE CONGREGATION THE BUILDING IS BEING RESTORED AND THE FUTURE OF THE CHAPEL UNDER THE MINISTER{JOHN {HATTERSLEY}IS MUCH MORE SECURE. THE CHAPEL AT{LUCKETT}IS THE SCENE OF A THRIVING COMMUNITY UNDER THE MINISTER{ {JOHN WREN.}BOTH CHAPELS ARE IN THE CALLINGTON AND GUNNISLAKE CURCUIT.
